jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Develop and execute on go-to-market strategy; drive pipeline needed to hit quarterly signing targets across a broad portfolio of complex legal solutions 
● Design a regional marketing strategy  
● Test channels and continue to improve and iterate on our marketing strategy over time 
● Work closely with leaders within Gojek to evolve the company’s narrative 
● Work collaboratively with Sales to create and execute a winning full-funnel strategy 
● Lead, mentor, and grow a high-performing marketing team
jobsJson.description:
● Develop and execute on go-to-market strategy; drive pipeline needed to hit quarterly signing targets across a broad portfolio of complex legal solutions
● Design a regional marketing strategy
● Test channels and continue to improve and iterate on our marketing strategy over time
● Work closely with leaders within Gojek to evolve the company’s narrative
● Work collaboratively with Sales to create and execute a winning full-funnel strategy
● Lead, mentor, and grow a high-performing marketing team
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Bachelor degree from reputable university
  • At least 7 years of working experience in marketing from brand, Startup or FMCG preferred
  • Solid experience in handling ATL and BTL marketing
  • Experience in managing large teams and navigating through complex organizations
  • Easily adapt to change, shows flexibility, prioritisation, organisation and time management skills
  • Excellent communication skills with demonstrated interpersonal flexibility and strong team management skills
